remarks: Complementation is an antiautomorphism on power set lattices. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 4-Nov-2014.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 17-May-2015.)
statement:
compss.a $e |- F = ( x e. ~P A |-> ( A \ x ) ) $.
compssiso $p |- ( A e. V -> F Isom [C.] , `' [C.] ( ~P A , ~P A ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d V x $.
